name: occam-directed-graphs
author: James Smith
description: Directed graphs comprised of directed acyclic graphs together with cycles.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run batch && npm run clean
scripts.build-debug: npm run clean && npm run batch-debug && npm run clean
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run batch && npm run incremental
scripts.watch-debug: npm run clean && npm run batch-debug && npm run incremental-debug
